page.title: 16Message_Children In Future.
page.content: We hope your generation lives in a peaceful world & people are free.We want to protect wild life at home & abroad particularly, that threatened with extinction eg. by disturbed food chains.Our parents work hard to protect our future. We will protect yours. We appreciate all the nice things we have & want to pass them on. We wish you happy lives.We hope in the future,you will look after Glenkindie, Glenbuchat & Towie because we think it is special. Words of Advice:'Flee laigh an' ye'll flee lang.'-Fly low & you'll fly long. 'Gerss on the ither side o' the dyke is nae better.'-Be content with what you have. It would be good if you kept our country traditions like making cheese & butter,our Doric language & 'Robbie Burn's Night' on the 25th of January.
